text: Hossein Nouri (, born 4 August 1990) is an Iranian wrestler who won a Bronze medal in the men's Greco-Roman 85 kg He won gold medals at the 2017 and 2018 and 2019 Asian championships and 2018 Asian Games and He won gold medal World Cup 2016. Known as Hossein Nouri He won the gold medal at the 2018 Asian Wrestling Championships He won the bronze medalist at the 2017 World Wrestling Championships He won the gold medal at the 2017 Asian Wrestling Championship He won the gold medal at the 2019 Asian Wrestling Championship He won the gold medal at the Wrestling at the 2018 Asian Games – Men's Greco-Roman 87 kg.He won gold medal 2016 Wrestling World Cup - Men's Creco-Roman ==References== https://www.mehrnews.com/tag/%D8%AD%D8%B3%DB%8C%D9%86+%D9%86%D9%88%D8%B1%DB%8C mehrnews https://www.varzesh3.com/Search?q=%D8%AD%D8%B3%DB%8C%D9%86%20%D9%86%D9%88%D8%B1%DB%8C varzesh3See alsoo Category:Living people Category:1990 births Category:Iranian male sport wrestlers Category:World Wrestling Championships medalists Category:Wrestlers at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games medalists in wrestling Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Iran Category:Asian Games competitors for Iran
title: Hossein Nouri
